name: Qualler Geballer
description:
Qualler Geballer is a 2D Action Game that can teach you how to mix colors!

See Online Leaderboard here.

Made for the ScoreSpace Jam #14

CONTROLS:
W - Forward
A - Rotate Left
D - Rotate Right
Space - Shoot
J-K-L - Drop Color
Esc - Pause

Created by Xanashea and Soelna

Music by Stegoratops

Disclaimer: This version is not supported for mobile devices.
Also we might make a colorblind friendly version in the future.
